name: Road Fury (itch)
description:
With a flashy 80's style theme that never gets old and a gameplay inspired by one of the coolest racing games ever made, Road Fury pays homage to early video-game titles with a totally reimagined art style and mechanic. The game features:

- 3D graphics with flat-shading on artistic low-poly models

- Fast-paced and tight control gameplay

Prototype Extra Instructions:

- The game still needs a closing or replaying condition, so Windowed Mode is advised to close it, or Alt+F4 to finish the application

- It's one of the first and very early versions of the game, please keep that in mind when downloading it

- Please report any bugs you find

How to Install:

- Download the zip file, unzip it, and double click or execute Road Fury .exe
